Question: This person's audio recording of the book earned her a nomination for the Grammy Award for Best Spoken Word Album.
Hints: This person began her campaign by visiting every county in the state, in a "listening tour" of small-group settings.
In anticipation of high sales, publisher Simon & Schuster paid this person a near-record advance of $8 million.
In the 2008 election, this person was a leading candidate for the Democratic presidential nomination.
